content: tail for sewing fold the last two rounds up invisible fasten_off and carry the end through to the bobble cid 425 om sew the pom-pom to round 1 of the beanie sew the beanie to the head your zipper the penguin is done i hope you enjoyed this pa cid 425 ern and if you d like to share your finished crea cid 415 on on instagram please tag me @abbyscrochetplushies happy croche cid 415 ng © abbys crochet plushies 2025
